content: अहीन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unimpaired, whole, entire, all; भृतभूतिरहीनभोगभाक् <ls>Śi. 16. 71.</ls> {@--2@} Not inferior, great; अहीनबाहुद्रविणः शशास <ls>R. 18. 14</ls>; <ls n="R.">9. 5.</ls> {@--3@} Not deprived of, possessed of; <ls>Ms. 2. 183.</ls> {@--4@} Not outcast or vile. {@--5@} (अहोभिः साध्यते, अहन्-ख <ls>P. IV. 2. 43</ls>) Lasting for several days; द्व्यहीन, त्र्यहीन &c. --नः {@--1@} A sacrifice lasting for several days (--नं also); <ls>Ms. 11. 198.</ls> {@--2@} A large snake. {@--3@} The lord of serpents, Vāsuki (अहि-इनः).
